sen.j: 中村 勘九郎（なかむら かんくろう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Kankuro NAKAMURA is a myoseki (professional name) of kabuki actor.
Kankuro NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Kankuro NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Its yago (stage family name) is Nakamuraya.
The stage family name is Nakamuraya.
The stage family name is Nakamuraya.
Its jomon (family crest) is Kakugiri Icho, Maizuru.
The Jomon (family crest) is Kakugiri Icho (ginkgo leaves in an octagon), Maizuru (literally, a dancing crane in the shape of a circle).
The Jomon (family crest) is Kakugiri Icho (ginkgo leaves in an octagon), Maizuru (literally, a dancing crane in the shape of a circle).

sen.j: 中村勘三郎 (初代)の長男。

sen.j: 長男は中村勘三郎 (4代目)、次男は6代目勘三郎。
sen.e: His oldest son was Kanzaburo NAKAMURA (the fourth) and the second son was the sixth Kanzaburo.

sen.j: 中村勘三郎 (12代目)の隠居名。
